comments:
An ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException occurs if an exception occurs during the 
command execution and a call is made to isSaveNeeded(). The saveIndex should 
not be set unless the top index is also set (to something other than -1). Here 
is the stack trace:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
	at java.util.ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:326)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.command.BasicCommandStack.isSaveNeeded
(BasicCommandStack.java:299)

(UML2Editor.java:1475)

(EditorManager.java:1184)

ged(DefaultPartPresentation.java:556)

The fix is committed to CVS.
The fix is available in the latest driver.
